留言內容: Mu husband is 6'2" and 165lbs - the medium fits him perfectly. This has quickly become one of his favorite summer shirts - it has been washed over and over again with no quality issues. It hasn't faded, it hasn't lost any buttons, it still looks amazing.Great cruise/summer weather shirt at a good price.

商品名稱: Amazon Essentials 男款標準合身度假襯衫
SKU: 尺寸: Medium顏色: 薰衣草棕櫚葉印花
留言內容: I usually wear smalls or smediums when it comes to button up shirts. When I received this small shirt it was just too wide. I felt like I was swimming in it. The material was stiff and "vacation" style buttoning (missing the top button) was just too much for me to handle.

商品名稱: Amazon Essentials 男款標準合身度假襯衫
SKU: 尺寸: Medium顏色: 薰衣草棕櫚葉印花
留言內容: This is a nice shirt that does fit as expected, so probably no need to size up or down from your normal choice. It is 95% cotton which makes it breathable and cool.  The pattern I chose with palm leaves on a lavender background is quite attractive.  It is machine washable, so no need to bring it to the dry cleaner.  They call it a vacation shirt, which I can understand, because it is festive and appropriate to wear in a variety of settings, such as at a beach hotel or a cruise ship or for that matter anywhere else you want.  I believe that it is intended for wearing outside your pants or shorts, which is how I plan on wearing mine.  I like mine a lot.

商品名稱: Amazon Essentials 男款標準合身度假襯衫
SKU: 尺寸: Large顏色: 藍色花卉
留言內容: This is a nice looking "summer" shirt - and since it's marketed as a vacation shirt, I am basing my rating on that. Unless you are going on vacation to somewhere with a brisk temperature, this shirt is likely going to too hot for a beach etc.Also, unless you like it snug, order a size up - I would say this shirt is more slim fit than it is standard fit.The material is not particularly soft but the shirt is sturdy and still comfortable. The pattern is nice and bright (I received the floral print)Overall this is a good shirt but the sizing should be roomier and more "true to" for a casual shirt...and I wish it were a bit lighter as it looks "summerish" but doesn't feel that way because it's so heavy.

商品名稱: Amazon Essentials 男款標準合身度假襯衫
SKU: 尺寸: Medium顏色: 藍色花卉
留言內容: The camp collar shirt is the it piece for men this summer.This color is slightly slimmer unless exaggerated than other brands camp collars. I actually like this take the most!The fabric is very tech for being a Summer shirt. If you like a thicker sturdier fabric then this is great. The fabric is moisture wicking and feels a little bit like a breezy camping or hiking Nylan shirt. This shirt does not feel like cotton. It is not overly stretchy. If you like a sturdy nonstretch shirt then you will love this.The fabric is very tech for being a Summer shirt. If you like a thicker sturdier fabric then this is great. The fabric is moisture wicking and feels a little bit like a breezy camping or hiking Nylan shirt. This shirt does not feel like cotton. It is not overly stretchy. If you like a sturdy nonstretch shirt then you will love this.What colors are vivid! You will absolutely love the pattern and look super stylish an any summer event. These shirts go great with pants, shorts, or at the beach with swim trunks. I love how versatile this shirt is and that it’s perfect for a hot summer days.The standard sizing is quite oversized. If you’re looking for that oversized boxy look than order your true size. If you like some thing a little slimmer or tighter than you’re going to need to size down.

商品名稱: Amazon Essentials 男款標準合身度假襯衫
SKU: 尺寸: Medium顏色: 藍色花卉
留言內容: The sleeves go to the elbows on the person wearing this (5'10"), not mid-bicep like it looks on the model. That's after washing & drying to account for any shrinkage. So the sleeves look a little weird.Other than that, the shirt fits fine. Shoulders, torso, overall length - they all fit correctly.Material is smooth, like a poplin. Light, a good summer weight. The "blue sketch floral" print is as shown, maybe just a bit more blue than the photos show.

商品名稱: Amazon Essentials 男款標準合身度假襯衫
SKU: 尺寸: Large顏色: 水洗藍
留言內容: Well, I don't cruise but I do resort, a lot. This shirt is entirely adequate for that purpose as resort formal wear. It is true to size and competently constructed and the washed blue version has the added benefit of if I decide to purloin a name tag I could very easily blend in with the wait, maintenance or housekeeping staffs. If you're striving to reduce carryon luggage, it might even suffice as a pajama top. That said, it doesn't look anywhere as tourist blatant as some of the other varieties available via this vendor.

商品名稱: Amazon Essentials 男款標準合身度假襯衫
SKU: 尺寸: Large顏色: 水洗藍
留言內容: This a is a good looking shirt. With the standard fit it will not be for guys will a belly. However, it was too tight in the shoulders and sleeves. I felt like the Hulk ready to break out of his clothes. A casual shirt should be much looser. The color was nice. The material is not particularly soft but does seem somewhat resistant to wrinkles. I am not a muscle man by any stretch but this shirt is best for the very thin person.

商品名稱: Amazon Essentials 男款標準合身度假襯衫

商品名稱: Amazon Essentials 男款標準合身度假襯衫

留言內容: The shirt is comfortable.  I marked it as "true to size" but if you have a larger tummy you may want to size up.  The color is nice and accurately depicted.  Quality seems average.  Cotton is slightly "rougher" but you don't feel that.  I'm being a bit nitpicky on this one.  Price is reasonable.  4 star rated.

商品名稱: Amazon Essentials 男款標準合身度假襯衫

商品名稱: Amazon Essentials 男款標準合身度假襯衫
SKU: 尺寸: Large顏色: 藍色花卉
留言內容: Got this in Large for my dad and it fits true to size. I went with the blue floral pattern which is overall nice in-person, but the base color is greener than it is in the photos. Overall good quality and perfect for summer.

商品名稱: Amazon Essentials 男款標準合身度假襯衫
SKU: 尺寸: Large顏色: 藍色花卉
留言內容: I got this shirt in the Blue, Sketch/Floral design  and like it a lot.  The material has a nice medium weight and a quality feel.  It's not super soft but has more of a firm oxford kind of feel.  The floral print looks great and has a lot of character, giving this a sort of quasi Hawaiian feel but with a whimsical twist.  It runs a little bit large.  I wear XL most of the time but the large in this one fits me just fine.  Stick with your normal size if you like a relaxed fit or consider sizing down for a cleaner fit or if you're between sizes.  Great shirt all around.

商品名稱: Amazon Essentials 男款標準合身度假襯衫

商品名稱: Amazon Essentials 男款標準合身度假襯衫
SKU: 尺寸: Medium顏色: 藍色花卉
留言內容: Great quality shirt that easily matches other competitors you would find in person. One thing that’s important to take note of is the cut of the collar. It’s pretty sharp but its clearly shown in the product images. This is intentional, but it’s definitely something to remember if that’s not what you’re looking for.It makes a great fit and I actually didn’t mind wearing it in the sun either(which surprised me!). I wouldn’t worry about sizing with this shirt, you should be okay ordering your normal size especially if you plan on wearing it open!If you’re looking for that classic “vacation” look, this is a great find!

商品名稱: Amazon Essentials 男款標準合身度假襯衫
SKU: 尺寸: X-Large顏色: 淡藍鳥印花
留言內容: Fun shirt that fits well. It has a nice cotton feel with a slight stretch, which contributes to the perfect wear and versatility.  There is no top button at the collar, of which I'd never wear fastened, but it helps when the shirt is on a hanger. The collar cut and splay are intended for an open appearance anyway. After washing and drying, the shirt held its structure and had almost no rumple, so ironing was unnecessary. It's a fun, quirky, and comfortable shirt...It's a vacation.
